wmndsFileDownloadProps.name: fileName
wmndsFileDownloadProps.description: Required. The file name of the download.

wmndsFileDownloadProps.name: fileType
wmndsFileDownloadProps.description: Required. The file type of the download e.g. doc, pdf.

wmndsFileDownloadProps.name: downloadLinkText
wmndsFileDownloadProps.description: Custom text to be displayed in the download link.

wmndsFileDownloadProps.name: accessible
wmndsFileDownloadProps.description: Determines whether to display the file as an accessible or non-accessible file component. Defaults to true.
